title: Rename app on welcome/login page and enable subject edit/delete in question bank

requirements.summary: Update the Login page branding from 'Exam Craft' to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'
acceptanceCriteria: The Login page no longer shows 'Exam Craft' anywhere.
The Login page displays 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' as the app name/branding.

file_operations.description: Replace any instances of 'Exam Craft' in the branding panel with 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'. Update the main heading text and any other branding references to use the new app name.

requirements.summary: Add Edit and Delete buttons for each subject in the Question Bank Subjects tab, enabling inline subject management
acceptanceCriteria: Each subject listed in the Subjects tab of the Question Bank has a visible Edit button and a Delete button.
Clicking Edit opens a dialog pre-filled with the subject's current name; saving the form updates the subject.
Clicking Delete shows a confirmation prompt; confirming removes the subject from the list.
After editing or deleting, the subject list refreshes to reflect the updated state.

file_operations.description: In the Subjects tab, modify the subject list rendering to display Edit and Delete buttons for each subject. Wire the Edit button to open the SubjectManager's edit dialog with the subject data pre-filled. Wire the Delete button to show a confirmation dialog and then call the deleteSubject mutation from useQueries.ts. Ensure the subject list re-queries after successful edit or delete operations.
